author: maxb
msg: Unify the handling of shell argument quoting in Python code throughout

author: maxb
msg: mailer.py: Make the 'diff' option overridable per-group.
The option [general].diff is deprecated in favour of [defaults].diff
(Config.__init__): No longer split the diff cmd here. Add compatibility code
to handle old config file format.
(Config.get): Make it possible to retrieve an option without parameter
(Config.get_diff_cmd): Fetch the 'diff' option via Config.get(), so the
default may be overridden in groups.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.conf.example: Document the move of the 'diff'    option, and its new overridability.

author: hynnet
msg: Update Simplified Chinese translation on trunk:
Translated all the stuff that was merged from trunk since r12350
